Text: Yeah, everyone, you're startin' to get the hang of it. Come now, let's take a mighty step further. First, here you go.
Aha! What a cute stuffed animal! Maho-sensei, was this handmade by you?
Sure did. This lil' one here's Bedivere, that one's Agravaine, and this sweetie is...
We don't need to hear their names. More importantly, what on earth are you planning to use stuffed animals for?
Now, now, no need to be rushin' me. I'm going to be settin' a mighty example, so watch closely. *Glide and sway*, Kururinpa~☆
Huh?! She's walking around with a stuffed animal on her head!
What's more, the stuffed animal isn't even shaking. Just what kind of balance does she have...
Come now, you too! Be makin' sure you don't drop this mighty little one～
Even if you say that... *Glide and sway*, *Glide and sw-...AAAAH! I can't do it! It'll fall off right away!
Of course this'd be impossible... Wait, HUH?!
*Glide and sway*, *glide and sway*... Kururinpa~☆ *Glide and sway*, *glide and sway*... Kururinpa~☆
Th-That country girl... she's making it look so easy! Wh-Why...?!
Hmm, I wonder if it's because my legs and core got stronger from everyday work and combat?
Normally, I'd hate the idea of having gained some muscle, but I'm surprised they're being put to good use like this.
*Glide and sway*, *Glide and sw*-... KYAH!
I-I'm sorry... I didn't see where I was going...
It's fine. Hey, why don't you forget about the stuffed animal for a moment and just focus on maintaining your posture? By there, try to progress little by little.
Y-Yeah, I'll try. First, my posture... Then, little by little... Ah, um...
That was good! Keep it up!
...Hey, if you don't mind, could you teach me the steps, too?
Yes, of course. Then, let's go at this together! *Glide and sway*, *glide and sway*...
You're just a country bumpkin, yet you're getting so carried away! I'll just fake a stumble and throw her off her game. Let's see how you handle that you potato smelling bumpkin!
*Glide and sway*, *glide and swaaaa... Aaaah, oh no, I tripped!!!!
Kururinpaaaaa~☆
She dodged?! L-Let me try that again...!
H-How is she dodging me?!
...Hold up, my Darlin' Prince. Let us be waitin' and see. Be prepared to be mighty jumpin' in if something be happenin'.
*pant pant*... Why... why is someone like me losing to a country bumpkin like you... AAH!
Kururin... PAAAA~!
KYAAAH... H-Huh...?
Phew, that was close. Are you okay? Hurt anywhere?
Ah, ugh... O-Of course I'm fine! More importantly, could you let me go already?
Oh my, I'm so sorry.
What the heck... I tried to pull something underhanded and it didn't even work. And then she goes and helps me?! Ugh, this is so humiliating... At this rate, I'll be the laughingstock of high society
Um, I'm sorry... for causing you all sorts of trouble.
Don't worry about it. You were trying so hard that your legs got all tangled up, weren't you? However... if you get hurt, you won't be able to dance beautifully at the ball. Make sure to be careful!
I-It's not like you have to tell me! And for the record, I'm totally going to surpass you!
Sure! Let's do our best until the very end!
My, my~ Ain't this just the sweetest lil' picture of youthful spirit. Why, even ol' Maho-sensei's feelin' mighty fired up now!
Now then, everyone... Let's be doin' a Kururinpa~☆ One-Thousand Strike Drill!
EEEEHHHHHHH?!
Afterwards, inspired by Lima's dedication, the other participants helped each other through the tough lessons, and all of them passed the exam.
...Let's work hard together!
My job is to help you and the others, Lima-chan
You look very happy, somehow
This girl is Lima-chan
That looks dangerous, I'll go stop her
Participants
The day after successfully completing their deportment lesson, Lima and the others waited in anticipation for the next lesson to be announced.
Now then, I wonder what kind of lesson is next? I'm already looking forward to it!
